title: Equaliser

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Roleblock a player.
- Heal a player besides yourself. You cannot use this ability until Night 4.
- Attack a player. You cannot use this ability until Night 4.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- On Night 3, you will join the faction of which faction has the most percentage of dead players. Neutrals are not included in this.
- Example: There are 4 Everfrost members and 10 Town members. 2 Everfrost members are dead but 4 Town members are dead. You will actually join Everfrost, they have 50% of dead players compared to Town of 40% dead people. If there is a tie percentage, you will join a random faction from the tie.
- If you join a REF, you will also join their factional chat. You can't use their factional kill though.
- If no one is dead, you will become a NK with the goal to kill everyone.
- You may multitask.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Survive until Night 3 and complete your goal.
